text: unauthorized entries prescribed manner of posting amend rsa to read as follows prescribed manner of posting a person may post his or her land to prohibit criminal trespass and physical activities by either or both of the following posting signs of durable material with any words describing the physical activity prohibited such as no hunting or trespassing printed with block letters no less than inches in height and with writing in the name and address of the owner or lessee of such land is optional such signs shall be posted not more than yards apart on all sides and shall also be posted at gates bars and commonly used entrances this section shall not prevent any owner from adding to the language required by this section painting purple paint on trees rocks or posts in vertical lines of not less than inches in length and not less than one inch in width placed so that the mark is between and feet from the ground and placed at locations no more than yards apart on all sides and at gates bars and commonly used entrances unauthorized entries penalty amend rsa to read as follows penalty any person who is found removing defacing or destroying any sign poster paint marks or property of another shall be guilty of a class b misdemeanor
